TITLE: Logical Fallacies
DEF: Errors in reasoning that invalidate arguments
TASK: The Logical Fallacies pattern focuses on educating learners to identify and avoid errors in reasoning that can undermine the validity of an argument. It is essential to foster critical thinking and improve learners' ability to construct and evaluate arguments. Challenges could arise from learners' misconceptions or a lack of exposure to a variety of fallacies. For effective application, this pattern requires educators to introduce various logical fallacies, provide relevant examples, and potentially utilize AI systems to simulate debates or critique arguments.
